committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to insure that the compensation and other emoluments attached to the Office of Attorney General are those which were in effect on January 1, 1969.

summary.text: Provides that the compensation and other emoluments attached to the Office of Attorney General are those which were in effect on January 1, 1969.

titles.title: A bill to insure that the compensation and other emoluments attached to the Office of Attorney General are those which were in effect on January 1, 1969.
